website_summaries.verdict: An excellent, high-quality option if you only need one button and receiver. Works perfectly and doesn't need any batteries.
pros: This wireless system converts kinetic energy to electricity to carry the signal from the button to the receiver
Extremely well-made, dependable, and easy to install
cons: The receiver must be plugged into a wall outlet
Only comes with one button and can only manage up to three buttons

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless door bell for a nominal price.
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless door bell for a nominal price. I live on a large property, my front door is several hundred feet away from the gate and we needed something that would allow delivery drivers and guests to notify us when they're out there. I purchased this unit, because it was waterproof and didn't require a battery. It works perfectly, the signal is strong and rings twice for every push of the button. The interior receiver has several ring tones to choose from and two volume settings.
customer_reviews.author: Lourna B.

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless doorbell, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a waterproofed all weather button is solidified with a battery-less design. This is the best wireless doorbell I've purchased. The last two did not last but a few days before they malfunctioned. The button itself is larger than most, so plan ahead for placement. I used the back mounting bracket instead of adhesive, which works great. The receiver has three volume levels, and the highest is loud enough for us to hear upstairs. The center light on the bell does stay lit, so we plugged it in and left it in a corner, it's out of the way and stays out of sight. I would recommend this doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: InigoMontoya

customer_reviews.title: Maintenance free, no batteries required but...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Wireless. 2. Transmitter (button) requires no batteries. 3. Receiver (bell) plugs to your electric socket. 4. Twenty five different ringtones. 5. You can have up to three buttons with one bell. 6. You can adjust bell volume to low, medium or high. (high is too loud for me) Cons: 1. Sometimes you need to press button two to three times to ring the bell. 2. I have thick walls and a metal door therefore wireless range is significantly less for me (around 110 feet or approximately 35m) Final thoughts: Good quality, good price and loud. It requires no batteries so it’s virtually maintenance free. Does not always ring the first time you press its button.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: ... the push button fell out rendering the whole system useless. Can't explain why the failure occurred
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a few months and the blue retainer ring around the button failed (broke) and the push button fell out rendering the whole system useless. Can't explain why the failure occurred. REVISION TO MY REVIEW: I contacted the Seller regarding my problem and was offered a full 100% refund even though I was past their 30 day warranty period. The Seller, Lavulous, was very prompt to respond to my initial review and I highly recommend doing business with them. I intend to add them to my "Preferred Seller" list.
customer_reviews.author: Mikemal

customer_reviews.title: no batteries needed
customer_reviews.text: I like the doorbell but the button doesn't look much like a button and people don't seem to know what it is. I think that I will have to use my label maker to get people to start using it. I like that the button doesn't use batteries. The one that I bought at Lowes went dead in a couple of weeks, it was most likely defective.
customer_reviews.author: wendell lyle

customer_reviews.title: No Batteries! Kinetic Doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: The kinetic push button improved my life by about 50%. The default bell is "Ding dong, ding dong." The others are pretty lengthy so I just left everything at default. So 1) Plug the base into a wall electric socket; 2) Press the kinetic button; 3) Hear "Ding dong, ding, dong. This will last for years and I won't have to spend my life figuring out that the batteries have been dead for weeks and then look up what kind of weird batteries they need and then buy them online. This uses no batteries. Also, it is obvious how to press the bell and it takes no effort. This is a great, great product!
customer_reviews.author: r1

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. I've tried many other systems that required unusual batteries, especially on the outside doorbell button. None of these worked for longer than a couple months. Installation of this product was a breeze, I used the adhesive pad to fix the doorbell button to the outside door area. It has provided solid contact, and in two months hasn't shown any signs of deterioration or problems. And the ringer requires just a plug-in. I finally have a doorbell that works. Sometimes when I come home, I ring it just for the pure joy of having a good doorbell!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lacey

customer_reviews.title: An 18 month doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doorbell hoping it would answer my needs since my Ring.com did not. There seems to be a problem with wireless doorbells at my house but I was hoping this one would be working for longer than it has. It appears I will have to replace it if I want to know when someone is at my door. Shouldn't it have lasted longer than this?
customer_reviews.author: jaba

customer_reviews.title: and it's still working beautifully. No need for batteries
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over a year, and it's still working beautifully. No need for batteries, no need to think about it. It just always works, even though the outside part has been entirely exposed to the elements. Installation was a breeze ... everyone should use doorbells like this one. It's perfect. I thought at first that people might not know to push it, since the button doesn't quite look like a normal doorbell, but so far, everyone who has needed to use it has found it and used it without problem, even though they'd never seen it before.
customer_reviews.author: ocalhoun

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT! We built a new house and forgot to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! We built a new house and forgot to wire for a door bell - really. This doorbell was a perfect fix! I love that it came with the adhesive hanging option. Took all of 30 seconds to plug in the bell and attach the button to the door. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great bell for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell works great! No batteries required and installation was a breeze. There are multiple chimes to choose from and I am very please with my purchase. I love that the button is well made and waterproof, I have replaced another brand 3 times due to water creeping in and finally settled on this one. It is used for a business so it gets pretty heavy use and has been going strong for about a year now. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Potential
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I should have been more generous and given it four stars. I find only one problem with this product. Often times it will not ring on the first press and unless the person at the door (often a delivery in my case) realizes it didn't ring, they may think it did and just leave. When it works, it's great, simple, and loud.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Yey, No Batteries
customer_reviews.text: This unit meets my needs perfectly. I had two other units before, bought batteries for both transmitter and receiver several times. The transmitters didn't stand up to the rain and heat. It's wonderful not to worry about batteries getting weak at the most inopportune time. The transmitter batteries were not the kind you normally keep around the house. I’m willing to reset the tone after a power outage and not have to worry about any batteries. Oh yes, the unit arrived in the time promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I rent my apartment so looks like there is no removing the bell so it will ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks! after 12 months still going strong. 25 feet apart and no issues. Doorbell still firmly stuck to outside brick wall. I rent my apartment so looks like there is no removing the bell so it will stay when I leave.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wireless Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Doorbell back in Jan of 2018 and it is still going strong. I took a chance with this doorbell to replace a wireless battery draining POS doorbell, which I bought from H.D. almost $40. This doorbell installation was easy and best of all (NO BATTERY REQUIRED). The sounds are great; load and clear. I installed this doorbell over 6 months ago and it is still going. After 6 months of testing I am confidence to purchase another one for my side-gate . In my opinion, this is the best wireless door bell in the market.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: kind of phoney sounding chimes, and scrolling through 30+ ...
customer_reviews.text: kind of phoney sounding chimes, and scrolling through 30+ chimes to get to the one you want is time consuming. I wish there was an easier way to get to the chimes, perhaps a button on the back with a small digital display so I can quickly go from chime #1 to chime #30 or anything inbetween quickly without having to actually listen to each one, one at a time. Other than that it works very well even from 30 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Marco B.

customer_reviews.title: If it seems to have died
customer_reviews.text: The piece you click at the door was no longer sending a signal to the receiver. The receiver is working alright when I click the button for test. I was going to replace the battery-less device at the door with another I have. When I was going to remove it from the door, I pulled out the cover, touched the spring; and it started working normally. If this happens to you, remove the cover, and move things around. Something probably got stuck or loose with the heavy use. Working fine now. On July 28, it will be a full year since I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Blizzplanet

customer_reviews.title: SImple to install and works well.
customer_reviews.text: No batteries to replace and no wiring. Simply plug it into a electrical wall socket. Push button sticks easily to any type of door surface. Dozens of "chimes" to choose from. Very loud - I can here it at the front door when I am downstairs in the garage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. I got tired of replacing batteries on previous doorbells and their limited range. This product takes batteries out of the equation. I tested the button from down in my detached workshop about 150 ft from the receiver. Bell rang after the signal passed through two concrete block walls as well as several interior walls. I was impressed. As to longevity, only time will tell but this is the best product I've found to date.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I bought this second doorbell and was able to pair the door button so that two receivers ring when pushed, I placed one receiver on the ground floor of my house near the outside door where I installed the push button for visitors, The second receiver was placed on the second floor 50 feet from the push button. The system works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Padre

customer_reviews.title: SUPER-GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Really a good product. Easy to install even if you don't know nothing 'bout 'electricity. I got one for the front door and one for the back. Lots of ring tones, from traditional to crazy, and you can make them fetchingly-quiet or loud enough to set the hounds a'howling
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee

customer_reviews.title: "Chime" very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother as a housewarming gift. It is awesome! No batteries, no wires...its like magic! 24 different chimes to choose from. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Serafini

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My kids love picking the songs
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My kids love picking the songs. It is very loud and can be heard anywhere in the house. Customer service is outstanding. When my button fell off my house and broke using the adhesive strip, the company sent me another one. This one is drilled in this time and not going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Raines

customer_reviews.title: NICE no flipping batteries needed!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who would think using a grill type igniter to power a door bell would work. The idea worked and it doesn't snap like a grill lighter. People these are the type of products we need things that don't need batteries. GENIUS!!!! The product works great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sands

customer_reviews.title: I Am Grateful
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have three walls between the transmitter (Doorbell) and the chime and it works beautifully. Also I am grateful the seller Lavulous sent me a replacement part and gave superb instructions on how to pair the transmitter with the chime. Very pleased. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to "install" with double sided tape on the ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not get easier to use - ready immediately out of the package! Super easy to "install" with double sided tape on the ringer and plug into the wall for the chime. If you are putting the ringer outside, not protected from the elements, please consider caulk or an outdoor glue. Chime has strong volume and can be heard even over the photocopier. A total bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice of a product!
customer_reviews.text: Great bell, I m impressed it didn't have a battery for the transmitter. Most bells on amazon has that, and it's a hassle to replace them every months (less or more) depending how busy is your belly ringing goes. Over all, it's great, installation was simple and it's loud as I want it to be. There isn't any volume changes, but it's loud enough. Let's see how it last and any other functionalities issues down the months.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Iyageh

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell has been great so far! We were having a problem with the cheap doorbells we would buy at hardware stores getting wet and no longer working. So far the Vasteko has been far and away the best doorbell we've had. It's gotten soaked in the rain a couple of times and still works perfectly. We just keep it on the classic sound, but there are so many options for what the chime sounds like that it's kind of fun to listen through them all. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DeGennaro

customer_reviews.title: Vasteko Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for use in our church when there is only one person in the office so the office door can remain locked for safety. We are very pleased with how this works. And, glad not to have to replace batteries.
customer_reviews.author: TerryLynne Marx

customer_reviews.title: Wireless doorbell (alert system)
customer_reviews.text: these things are cool. No batteries needed, and several different ring styles. You can use this product for more than just a doorbell. You can plug the "bell" into any room and take the "button" into another room or another floor, or out on the patio, to ring another person, because it's wireless. Lots of uses for this thing and it still makes a great doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: driver

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for no access of a doorbell and you are in a different part of the house. It doesn't do video but the price is just right. Also has 10 + different tunes for a doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Mine is about 300- 400 feet away from the bell to the receiver and so far works great. Like the various tunes to
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for no batteries just plug in. Mine is about 300- 400 feet away from the bell to the receiver and so far works great. Like the various tunes to. It is very loud but it can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: yorkie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOORBELL!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell. We needed one on our garage since it opens to the side of our home. We placed the push button on the wood panel about 6" from the metal on the door. It was programmed with the receiver before it was shipped. It is very easy to change the tunes on the receiver and it is loud enough that we can hear it in every room. We love it & couldn't believe how easy it was to install,
customer_reviews.author: dollcesa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a month now and it’s perfect. It works exactly as described. I’m so happy I don’t have to worry about changing batteries, especially during colder temperatures. It snows in my area and my previous wireless doorbell used to battery charge daily. So I’m so glad I came across this doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: risa717

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Four Level House.
customer_reviews.text: I have an eight bedroom 1920's house with first floor, second floor, third floor and full basement. The chimes can be heard on the first and second levels very loudly. If I keep all the doors open, it could be heard faintly on the third floor and full basement. But then if I want the bell to be heard more clearly in those distant parts of the house, I can simply unplug and move the chime. Thank you for inventing a doorbell without the need for a battery!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A Housewife

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: the mfg. needs to include a list of all tunes instead of having to cycle through all tunes.Also, would have liked a couple of scary halloween tunes
customer_reviews.author: JOHN A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the doorbell button doesn't need a battery. Pressing the button generates the charge to power the device. Battery powered doorbell buttons are less effective at lower temperatures and this doorbell button doesn't have that problem. The button is larger than most and easy to see and press. The device came with all hardware, is easy to install, and the chime and button were pre synced. Pressing the button once on the chime on changes the chime/sound. Pressing the button twice on the chime changes the chime/sound volume. My only regret is the button on the chime has a blue illumination when powered.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: No battery and works
customer_reviews.text: More than budgeted but it works. Loud enough to hear thru-out house and and has no problem sending signal to receiver/bell of about 60'. Plugged the receiver into a ceiling receptacle so bonus is nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact no batteries are needed
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact no batteries are needed, but am so frustrated with the volume control...every time I try to regulate, it goes on to the next "tune"! How does this work?
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Very easy to use. The quality is sturdy and the doorbell sound is great. It is very easy to hear from inside our apartment and the tone can be adjusted to your liking. The other nice thing is that when you are outside and press the doorbell, you can hear that it is ringing inside. And, of course, you don't need batteries and the cost was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Calhoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent idea and product
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Simple to install and with an effective ring. I used it for a home in a semi-rural location where the original house was built with only 1 front entrance doorbell connection. This avoided having to run and fish an additional line for the rear entrance (which is far more frequently used).
customer_reviews.author: Fred Pope JR

customer_reviews.title: BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Works almost great! Only problem is the low volume - I installed a larger (external) speaker - Now works great!
customer_reviews.author: Hi5er

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a design. It has no batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a design. It has no batteries, is waterproof and a rugged design. Now I know when someone is at the door and I get to listen to a self selected tone.
customer_reviews.author: Santina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bell
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect. Easy replacement for 40 year old wired set up. I would definitely recommend to anyone who needs a replacement doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco J.

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term solution.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 years. Also the button required a considerable amount of force to trigger the bell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Really easy
customer_reviews.text: Still working a year later !! Cute chimes, and change with the holiday. Has been pretty easy and flawless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best doorbell solution I could find...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have been easier to install...and I like the sound of the ring. Who would build a home without a doorbell? A cheap builder...
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Lin

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is so easy for him to place the receiver any place he ...
customer_reviews.text: My hard of hearing father can hear this! Works well and is so easy for him to place the receiver any place he so chooses. He likes this product and I'm pleased. ty!
customer_reviews.author: D. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: No Batteries needed.
customer_reviews.text: It has been great, works as described. No batteries included and no batteries needed. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bozena Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. As indicated the button works without batteries and works very well. The button is located approximately 50 feet from the bell component and down a hill with no problems. We have mounted or to a sign and it is exposed to the elements. So far it has worked even in pouring rain. The bell component has a large selection of bells and music and is easy to change your selection. All in all a nice product that works as advertised. Highly recommend getting this rather than a pricier electronic unit from a home improvement stir e
customer_reviews.author: MarkDS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a doorbell for a driveway gate to be able to wirelessly reach the interior of my house. This one has plenty of range, the interior chime is sufficiently loud and the best part of all - no batteries are required. The kinetic exterior switch works great and it has stood up to significant rainfall without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install! Happy with it EXCEPT the 20 some ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install! Happy with it EXCEPT the 20 some doorbell options are mostly annoying melodies. How about more "traditional" options? Otherwise my only complaint is why does Vasteko feel they need to have their name prominently printed on the door bell? People will think the "Vasteko's" live here. I had to cover it with a personalized label to avoid confusion. Nice product with a couple of east tweets.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Garman

customer_reviews.title: Now it is DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Unit was idle for couple months and then dead. Under year old should have warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Methos

customer_reviews.title: Both were more expensive than this and both gave up the ghost in pretty short order
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this after a couple of months of use. We had been through two Home Depot wireless doorbells over the previous six months or so. Both were more expensive than this and both gave up the ghost in pretty short order. So far, so good with the Vasteko doorbell. The button is much more substantial than the others we had previously and the fact that this is battery-free is a great additional benefit. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Vasteko system of transmitter(s) and Receivers, and simple installation
customer_reviews.author: Margree Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... without a battery in the button but it works perfect. Nice not having to replace battery
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how this works without a battery in the button but it works perfect. Nice not having to replace battery.
customer_reviews.author: RKrider

customer_reviews.title: Great product until it dies
customer_reviews.text: receiver lasted 6 days shy of one year before it died and stopped all together. I was thrilled with the "no Battery" push button but never expected the plug in receiver to kick the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Lance W. Voboril

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless doorbell so that I could place the button (not protected from weather) at my front gate, about 75' from receiver. I'd had one years ago, but got tired of replacing batteries and the range was bad. Then I saw this, no batteries. A minute or 2 to install, and it works great. 1/2 hour later a driving rain storm hits, I got soaked going out to test it in the rain, and then again after rain stopped. No problems, works fine. Now I just have to pick a tune, which will probably drive my wife crazy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryley Isetter

customer_reviews.title: They are a lot better than the dinging bell on the front counter
customer_reviews.text: We have these in our restaurants. They are a lot better than the dinging bell on the front counter. They are loud enough to alert our staff that someone is at the counter!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Deates

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and very nice quality. So easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: david seal

customer_reviews.title: It works well now, but for how long?
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems great, but the problem with wireless doorbells from my experience is that they don't work for very long. I bought a four-year square trade protection plan for it for that reason. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Kyriazi

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell
customer_reviews.text: works great!! How easy, ya just plug it in, pick your sound, and attach the door bell to your location
customer_reviews.author: cwakelam

customer_reviews.title: love not having to worry about all those crappy ringers ...
customer_reviews.text: love not having to worry about all those crappy ringers attached to your front door that work for about a week, then get this. I have had zero issues with it,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT IS EXACTLY LIKE THEY ADVERTISE IT.
customer_reviews.text: WORKS LIKE A CHARM AND ANYONE CAN PUT IT UP.
customer_reviews.author: maxine s.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is just great!! Such good quality compared to what an electrician recently attempted to sell me. It's attractive and seems very sturdy, and the chime can be heard clearly throughout our home. I'm really so pleased with this product! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H. Langerman

customer_reviews.title: Super easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Super easy installation! My only available button mount location was on irregular profile wood trim, so I was EXTREMELY glad that a screw-mounting plate was included. Loud, clear chime. ABSOLUTELY plug-n-play!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to
customer_reviews.text: This is serving very well and no complaints. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: j nichols

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It works as advertised and workmanship is excellent. Has no sharp corners. Looks completely professionally made. So looks good and works great!
customer_reviews.author: five string

customer_reviews.title: Great Door bell
customer_reviews.text: Love this doorfbell. No battery is a plus in the cold. Lots of choice of bell tones. Had used bell for two months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT exactly as advertised and easily can reset for ...
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC PRODUCT exactly as advertised and easily can reset for other sounds - hear clearly in other rooms - very simple to install
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: After 2-1/2 years, the push button door bell does not work. The receiver, or music box as I call it, works perfectly. They are no longer communicating.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: We love this door bell. No batteries. Easy install. Great tones....
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect device to replace my broken door bell
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect device to replace my broken door bell. So many different chimes to choose from. The spousalunit loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Margolis

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy instal
customer_reviews.text: Works great very loud easy install and no batteries could not ask for a better doorbell
customer_reviews.author: BOB DURANTE

customer_reviews.title: Greatest $26 I've spent in ages
customer_reviews.text: Greatest $26 I've spent in ages. I have an old gate with a dead intercom. It will all be replaced soon enough but in the meantime, I needed something to let my BF know I'm home so can let me in. This works better than the 100lb German shepherd. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sachsensox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Plug it in by the door and never worry again about batteries for the buzzer. Works as described, no issues, and waterproof. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sirovatka

customer_reviews.title: 18 months later... no sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 18 months. It pairs to the front door however I get zero sound - only a blinking light when I push the door bell. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: H.A.H

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this wireless doorbell. I live in a masonry home and the signal from the transmitter to the receiver has no issues. The battery was frequently draining in my previous wireless doorbell system. I like that this is battery free!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Deaver

customer_reviews.title: Very loud!
customer_reviews.text: It’s LOUD. Even in the low volume. If you need loud, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Beth W

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lots of options for the chime

product_meta.title: Vasteko Wireless Doorbell Kits No Battery Required for Both Transmitter and Receiver, IPX7 Waterproof Push Button, 3-Level Volume, 25 Ring Tunes (White)
feature_bullets: NO BATTERIES AND NO WIRES REQUIRED - Transmitter is used the unique PUSH-RF technology. When the button is pressed, it converts kinetic energy into an electrical signal to ring your wireless doorbells. So no more worrying your push button runs out of batteries and no more hassle in buying awkward weird batteries to run your push button. You will always be able to hear your doorbells ring!

IPX7 WATERPROOF TRANSMITTER - The internal components of the transmitter are waterproof coating, you can soak it in the water for long time, it still works well. Receiver is made of ABS plastic, inflaming retarding and environmental protection.

DEPENDABLE OPERATING RANGE - Each doorbell is set with a unique radio frequency code at the factory.This gaurantees your doorbell will not interfere with other remotes devices, and its 400ft(120m) operating range means you can place the plug-in unit several rooms away from the door.

CHOICE OF 25 CHIMES AND FLASHING LIGHT INDICATOR - This unit lets you choose the best way to be notified when someone is at your door. In addition to your choice of 25 selectable chime tunes, there's also a flashing light indicator that gives you a visual form of notification (an excellent feature for the hearing impaired). 3 levels of adjustable volume from 25db-85db (low- middle-high). Customize your volume easily by volume button.

EASY INSTALLATION - Plug-in receiver with 2-Pin US plug is suitable for an electrical outlet (AC); Mount the Push Button Transmitter to the wall with the provided screws/anchors, or stick it to the wall by using the enclosed double-sided adhesive tapes.
